column4: Hi, when I try to use Ubuntu live cd on my emachines T2245 when the Desktop GUI starts up, everything goes black.  The same cd works on my other computer though.  Is there a graphics driver problem or something?

Hi, when I try to use Ubuntu live cd on my emachines T2245 when the Desktop GUI starts up, everything goes black.  The same cd works on my other computer though.  Is there a graphics driver problem or something?

Hi, when I try to use Ubuntu live cd on my emachines T2245 when the Desktop GUI starts up, everything goes black.  The same cd works on my other computer though.  Is there a graphics driver problem or something?
before you hit enter to load the gui there should be an option for safe graphics mode or something similar
